title: Game doesnt show up in game history
body:
Hello,
I've recently played a normal game not ranked game, and it doesn't show up in my match history neither did my missions count it (The call of war (day 3) and The howl of noxus (5/10)).
I did pretty well that game :(.
is this some kind of bug or what?

replies.body: same, and mission didn't count. please fix

Found this across 3 accounts so far.  Simply, finish a game, check the Game History and see that the Game is not recorded.  Though this has been all in-client, I should note that a number of the third party apps (Mobalytics, LoLSumo) are also not getting the last games completed - and the third party situation has been happening for about 4 days (so it appears that the problem goes right into the API/database, not the client itself).
I checked server status they said they're aware of these two issues.

That's funny.

I just finished a game as Alistar and it doesn't show up in my match history at all.

Maybe the problem is related?
I think so. maybe the servers are bugged i guess.
could've had all the missions done but nah this company doesn't like people who play the game
Same, but it seems this issue affects only euw and eune.

> [{quoted}](name=EdasXD,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=RTf3h8uE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-30T10:39:39.581+0000)
>
> Same, but it seems this issue affects only euw and eune.

NA, unable to access match history and no update on connected sites. Also having missions fail to update (1 game out of 6-10 did randomly progress some missions).

Bump

Same issue here, riot plz fix I want my missions to update thx
Its not working for me to.. can we get some compensation bc of this bug tho?
just played another game and it didn't count also. please fix ASAP!!!
